Module contents

cosense3d.config.add_cfg_keys(func)[source]
cosense3d.config.load_config(args)[source]

Load yaml config file, merge additional config in args and return a dictionary.

Parameters

argsargparse object or str

if is str, it should be the yaml config filename else args.config indicates config yaml file

Returns

paramsdict

A dictionary that contains defined parameters.

Save config dictionary into yaml file.

Parameters

config_dict : dict filename : str

Returns
